Ceil
===
> Round a numeric value toward positive infinity.


<!-- <usage> -->
## Usage

``` javascript
var ceil = require( '@stdlib/math/base/special/ceil' );
```

#### ceil( x )

Rounds a `numeric` value toward positive infinity.

``` javascript
var val = ceil( -4.2 );
// returns -4

val = ceil( 9.99999 );
// returns 10

val = ceil( 0 );
// returns 0
```
<!-- </usage> -->


<!-- <examples> -->
## Examples

``` javascript
var ceil = require( '@stdlib/math/base/special/ceil' );

var x;
var i;

for ( i = 0; i < 100; i++ ) {
	x = Math.random()*100 - 50;
	console.log( 'ceil(%d) = %d', x, ceil( x ) );
}
```
<!-- </examples> -->
